message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  It's a good deal for you now, considering the inflation will hit you harder in later rounds.
Your initial offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. This is a more balanced proposal considering the inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. The inflation is working against you. I'm offering a better deal than your previous one, but I won't go any lower.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer.  It's a fair deal considering the shrinking pot. Let's close this out.
